sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"同意，赞同"之意。
means: agree ：普通用词，侧重指对某事同其他人有相同的意见或想法。
consent ：指同意别人的请求、建议或满足他人的愿望，着重意愿或感情，常和to连用。
approve ：侧重对认为正确或满意的事表示赞同或批准。作不及物动词用时，常与of连用。
comply ：指答应某人已经提出或可能要求做的某事，与with连用。
subscribe ：指完全地赞成已阐明的立场。多用于比较愿意支持一种立场或为一种立场所辨护的情况。

sentence.Network_en: As a Liberal Democrat I subscribe to the internationalist approach.
sentence.Network_cn: 作为自由民主党成员，我支持国际主义路线。

sentence.Network_en: Which journals does the library subscribe to?
I subscribe wholeheartedly to this theory.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'sign at the bottom of a document'): from Latin subscribere, from sub- 'under' + scribere 'write'

entry.def: If you subscribe to an opinion or belief, you are one of a number of people who have this opinion or belief.

example.ex: I've personally never subscribed to the view that either sex is superior to the other.
example.tran: 我个人从来都不同意性别有优劣之分的观点。

entry.def: If you subscribe to a magazine or a newspaper, you pay to receive copies of it regularly.

example.ex: My main reason for subscribing to New Scientist is to keep abreast of advances in science.
example.tran: 我订阅《新科学家》主要是为了了解科学的最新进展。

entry.def: If you subscribe to an online newsgroup or service, you send a message saying that you wish to receive it or belong to it.

example.ex: Usenet is a collection of discussion groups, known as newsgroups, to which anybody can subscribe.
example.tran: 全球新闻网络是由多个被称为新闻组的讨论组组成，任何人都可以注册加入。

entry.tran: 定期资助;定期捐款;定期捐助
entry.def: If you subscribe to a charity or a campaign, you send money to it regularly.

example.ex: I subscribe to a few favourite charities.
example.tran: 我定期向几个中意的慈善机构捐款。

entry.def: If you subscribe for shares in a company, you apply to buy shares in that company.

example.ex: Employees subscribed for far more shares than were available.
example.tran: 员工申请认购的股份远远超出实际可认购的额度。

means.word_mean: 1. offer to buy, as of stocks and shares;
2. mark with one's signature; write one's name (on);

sentences.sentence: "She signed the letter and sent it off"
"I subscribe to your view on abortion"

means.word_mean: 4. pay (an amount of money) as a contribution to a charity or service, especially at regular intervals;

sentences.sentence: "I pledged $10 a month to my favorite radio station"

means.word_mean: 5. receive or obtain by regular payment;

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"接近,靠近"; 2. 在后面;再; 3. 表示"在下面,次一等,副手"

stems_affixes.word_buile: sub接近,靠近+acid酸→adj.略酸的
sub接近,靠近+adult成年人→adj.接近成年的
sub接近,靠近+arctic北极的→adj.近北极的
sub接近,靠近+arid干燥的→adj.有点干燥的
sub接近,靠近+central中心的→adj.接近中心的
sub在下面,次一等,副手+limin门槛+al……的→在门槛下→在意识之下→潜意识的
sub在下面,次一等,副手+miss放+ive……的→放下面→恭顺的
sub在下面,次一等,副手+terr地+anean→地下的
sub接近+culture栽培,培育;文化→n.次培养基;亚文化 v.次培养
sub再+let出租→v.转租 n.转租的房屋
sub在下面,次一等,副手+area区域→n.分区
sub在下面,次一等,副手+branch枝, 分枝, 分部→n.小分支;支[分]店;分公司

stems_affixes.value_cn: 副助理监督, 副助理主教

sub在下面,次一等,副手+editor编辑→n.助理编辑
sub在下面,次一等,副手+head标题→n.小标题, 副标题
sub在下面,次一等,副手+office办公室→n.分办事处
sub在下面,次一等,副手+officer官员→n.下级军官
sub在下面,次一等,副手+title标题→n.副标题
sub在下面,次一等,副手+tropic热带+s→亚热带
sub下面+way道路→n.地道,地铁
sub接近+culture栽培,培育;文化→n.次培养基;亚文化 v.次培养
sub再+let出租→v.转租 n.转租的房屋
sub在下面,次一等,副手+due债务,义务→减轻
sub在下面,次一等,副手+jug牛轭+ate表动词→套上牛轭→镇压
sub在下面,次一等,副手+merg沉没+e→淹没下去
sub在下面,次一等,副手+orn装饰→在下面装饰[别人]→贿赂
sub在下面,次一等,副手+scrib写+e→在下面写上名字→订购
sub在下面,次一等,副手+side坐→坐下去→平息
sub在下面,次一等,副手+vert转→转下去→推翻
ascribe[v.把…归于]+able……的→adj.可归于……的
scrib写+e→n.抄写员,作者 v.划线

stems_affixes.value_cn: 捐助[认捐]者,出资者;签名者

a+scrib写+e→把……写上去→归因于
circum环+scrib写+e→画上一圈→限定
con大家+scrib写+e→大家写上名字→征兵
de去,出+scrib写+e→写出
in进入+scrib写+e→写进去→刻写
pre预先+scrib写+e→预先写好的→规定;处方
scrib写+ble→写→乱写
scrib写+e→n.抄写员,作者 v.划线
sub下面+scrib写+e→在下面写上名字[签名]→订购
trans转移+scrib写+e→把写的东西移到[另一张纸上]→transcribe抄写

sentences.cn: 他向慈善事业慷慨捐款。

sentences.en: I subscribed my name to the document.
I subscribed to a morning paper.
I heartily subscribe to that sentiment.

jushi.english: I subscribed my name as Tom.
jushi.chinese: 我把自己的名字通常签为汤姆。

jushi.english: The President has subscribed a new document.
jushi.chinese: 总统已签署了一份新文件。
